RAnEn::verifyMAE

Source: R/verifyMAE.R
verifyMAE.Rd

RAnEn::verifyMAE calculates mean absolute errors.

verifyMAE(anen.ver, obs.ver, boot = F, R = 1000, na.rm = T,
  parallel = F)

Arguments

anen.ver

A 4-dimensional array. This array is usually created from the value column of the analogs member in the results of generateAnalogs. The dimensions should be [stations, times, lead times, members].
obs.ver

A 3-dimensional array. The dimensions should be [stations, times, lead times]. You can generate the array using alignObservations.
boot

Whether to use bootstrap.
R

The number of bootstrap replicates. Used by the function boot::boot.
na.rm

Whether to remove NA values.
parallel

Whether to use parallel processing.

Contents

  • Arguments

Author

Laura Clemente-Harding laura@psu.edu

To set the number of cores to use when parallel is used, options(mc.cores = 8).
